description:
Sakura and Shizuki help Miyamoto have a get together with his secret admirer.
Sakura and Shizuki go to the movies for a date, but things go awry when Dokuro follows and when Sabato remakes an appearance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s the Romantic Cupid! Dokuro-chan! / It`s New Cinema Paradise! Dokuro-chan!
Koi no Cupid Da yo! Dokuro-chan! / New Cinema Paradise Da yo! Dokuro-chan!
Le cupidon de l`amour ! Dokuro-chan ! / New Cinema Paradise ! Dokuro-chan !
恋のキューピットだよ! ドクロちゃん! / ニューシネマパラダイスだよ! ドクロちゃん!
